     Project demo

  • Filmax

     Project demo

    The project consists of a web page with a catalog of movies and series, in the style of Netflix, HBO Max, Cuevana, among other examples. Here you can see, add, edit, delete movies and series, through an admin page. It also allows registering and entering a user.

  • Tic-Tac-Toe Game

    The 'Tic-Tac-Toe Game' is a project that creates an online version of the classic 'Tic-Tac-Toe' game. It uses React and React DOM to develop the user interface, Vite as the development environment, and ESLint rules to ensure clean code. Two players compete in real-time, and when one wins, it appears on the screen, ending the game.

    • React
    • React DOM
    • Vite
    • Multiplayer Game

  • Twitter Follow Card

    The Twitter Follow Card Component project focuses on developing a custom component for web applications using React. This component will allow developers to easily integrate Twitter follow cards into their sites with customization options. Vite is used as the development environment, and ESLint rules are applied to maintain code quality.

    • React
    • Custom Component
    • Vite
    • Social Media Integration

  • WorldSurveys - Final Project

    •     Project demo

    It is an app made with ReactJS with a survey theme, in which the admin can register surveys, modify them, view them and delete them. In it, tools such as React Router Dom are used to manage the routes that allow us to navigate between the different pages and JSON Server to simulate an external API.

    • ReactJS
    • React Router
    • Survey Management
    • API Integration
